price: كه وغواړي نو تاسو به له منځه يوسي او نور به راولي، او الله په دې ښه برلاسى دى.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَيَأۡتِ بِـَٔاخَرِينَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum ayyuhā al-nāsu wayati biākharīna wakāna al-lahu ʿalā dhālika qadīran
